head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths O'SHEA, ANNE (NEE PHELAN)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths O'SHEA, ANNE (NEE PHELAN)

block.p: O'SHEA-Anne (nee Phelan). On July 19, 2000. Native of Ballinaslee Attana, County Laois, Ireland. Devoted mother of Jeremiah, Donald, Maureen and Joseph. Beloved mother-in-law of Diana, Sally, Gloria and Martha. Cherished grandmother of Hilary, Suzanne, Jeremiah, Daniel, Donna, Wanda, Lori, Donald, Danny, Kimberly and Mark. A woman devoted to God & family. Reposing Cusimano Russo Funeral Home, 2005 West 6th St., Brooklyn. Funeral Mass St. Brendan's R.C. Church, Saturday at 10:15 AM. Interment is at St. Raymond's Cemetery. Visiting hours Friday, 2-5 and 7-10.
